description:
It does not take a genius to know that women can get seriously injured when competing against men in sports. Even five-year-olds know that. But Jayapal is not even the least bit smart, so much so that we wonder if she knows which shoe goes on which foot. Only someone so mentally incompetent would tearfully claim that it is physically impossible for men to injure women in sports.

But we all know that is an asinine statement. This is why Payton McNabb had to respond because her ‚Äúlife is forever changed because of an injury by a boy.‚Äù

Que Jayapal‚Äôs crocodile tears:

title: Rep. Jayapal‚Äôs claims trans athletes aren't hurting girls, gets fact-checked by girl who is still suffering thanks to one

description:
In New York City, it has become the status quo for squatters to be afforded private property rights through eminent domain, and authorities don‚Äôt typically bat an eye once an individual claims to be a tenant. And by claiming to be a tenant, all someone has to do is say the words ‚ÄúI am a tenant.‚Äù And magically, it is turned into a civil matter that is postponed through the courts in perpetuity.

Although it now appears to be rather easy for someone to move in while you are at work and take over the rights of your home, it also takes an immoral person to do that. Because people who have the slightest moral compass or even a drop of empathy would not do something like that. A ‚Äúsquatter‚Äù is reserved for the scummiest of people who lack values. So the fact that lawmakers think it‚Äôs compassionate to afford de
title: Two NYC Squatters Wanted For Beating A Woman To Death. Stuffing Her In A Duffel Bag Inside Her Late Mother's Apartment

description:
Congress released the text of the $1.2 trillion spending package. Taxpayers have less than 72 hours to look over the 1,000-page document as reports indicate it MUST be approved by Friday night or the government will shut down.

I know what you are thinking. It probably would be best for the taxpayers if the federal government were to shut down. Most of our problems come from Washington D.C. so maybe most of our problems would go away if they went away. But that is not the world we live in and we are beholden to the D.C. in bureaucracy which has demanded our taxpayers go to all things diversity.

If your goal is American excellence, then the last thing of
title: Biden's HHS set to receive taxpayer-funded DEI training that was snuck into the  $1.2 trillion spending package

description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

The BBC has sent a memo to all presenters that they can no longer let accusations of transphobia go unanswered after the network was forced to apologize to JK Rowling one too many times. Note: "presenter" is what the UK calls TV reporters. In America, people reading other people's words off of a teleprompter are called "journalists" and/or "freedom fighters." The UK goes with a more accurate term, since they are only "presenting" what they are told to say.
title: UK's BBC: No more recklessly calling people "transphobe" after we've had to apologize to JK Rowling twice

description:

I suppose if there is one consolation in Biden's border crisis, it's that smug journalismers at CNN can no longer ignore the border and have to suffer the indignity of reporting that, by YUGE margins, Americans prefer Donald Trump. CNN tried so hard over the last three years to avoid this, yet here we all are.

Don't get me wrong. I would prefer my country NOT be invaded by undocumented Democrats. The situation is out of my hands until November 5th. But
title: Watch: As illegals overwhelm border patrol in El Paso, check out these insane new polls comparing Trump vs Biden on Immigration
